text:
Menyetujui pengunduran diri sebagai Pemegang Saham Perseroan: Tuan XU, MINGMING dan Nona YANG, TIANTIAN, serta Persetujuan Jual Beli Saham dalam Perseroan:
1. Saham XU, MINGMING jual kepada Tuan LUO, YI sebanyak 10% atau 1.050 (Seribu Lima Puluh) Lembar.
2. Saham Nona YANG, TIANTIAN jual kepada Tuan LI, YIJIE sebanyak 5% atau
525 (lima ratus dua puluh lima) Lembar, sehingga merubah susunan Pemegang Saham menjadi sebagai berikut:
YANG, HAIXING, Pemegang Saham sebanyak 65% atau 6.825 (Enam Ribu Delapan Ratus Dua Puluh Lima) Saham, senilai Rp. 6.825.000.000 (Enam Milyar Delapan Ratus Dua Puluh Lima Juta).
LI, YIJIE, Pemegang Saham sebanyak 15% atau 1.575 (Seribu Lima Ratus Tujuh Puluh Lima) Saham senilai Rp. 1.575.000.000 (Satu Milyar Lima Ratus Tujuh Puluh Lima Juta Rupiah).-
trans:
Approving to  resign as the Share Holders of the Company: Mr. XU, MINGMING and miss YANG, TIANTIAN, and Agreement to Sale and Purchase of Shares in the Company:
1. Shares of XU, MINGMING sold to Mr. LUO, YI  for 10% or 1,050 (One Thousand Fifty) Shares.
2. Shares of Miss YANG, TIANTIAN sold to Mr. LI, YIJIE for 5% or
525 (five hundred twenty five) Shares, therefore, changing the Share Holder composition as follows:
YANG, HAIXING, Share Holder of 65% or 6,825 (Six Thousand Eight Hundred Twenty Five) Shares, for Rp. 6,825,000,000 (Six Billion Eight Hundred Twenty Five Million Rupiahs).
LI, YIJIE, Share Holder of 15% or 1,575 (One Thousand Five Hundred Seventy Five) shares for Rp. 1 ,575,000,000 (One Billion Five Hundred Seventy Five Million Rupiahs).
